title: Bluetooth Flow Meter Automation
subtitle: Wireless Data Capture for Fluid Management
teaser: Integrate directly with Bluetooth-enabled flow meters for accurate volume readings at pickup and disposal points.
body:
Seamless Integration with Modern Flow Meters

By integrating directly with Bluetooth-enabled flow meters, our app captures accurate volume readings at both pickup and disposal points. This eliminates manual data entry errors and ensures real-time data synchronization.

Technical Capabilities

  • Universal Compatibility: Works with all major flow meter brands and models
  • Automatic Calibration: Self-adjusting algorithms ensure accuracy across different meter types
  • Offline Functionality: Data cached locally and synced when connection restored
  • Multi-meter Support: Connect to multiple meters simultaneously for complex operations

Operational Impact

Field operators report a 70% reduction in data entry time and complete elimination of transcription errors. The system has processed over 10 million gallons of fluid transfers with 99.9% accuracy, setting new industry standards for data reliability.
